dialog.identity_prompt.description: Identity prompt defines the AI assistant's role and behavior in free work mode. It will be used as a fixed system prompt for all conversations, similar to Cursor's Rules feature.
dialog.identity_prompt.reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset to system default prompt?
dialog.identity_prompt.title: Identity Prompt Settings
dialog.identity_prompt.variable_hint: Use {variable_name} format to reference variables in the prompt, which will be automatically filled at runtime
dialog.identity_prompt.add_variable_prom: Enter variable name (letters, numbers, and underscores only):
dialog.prompt_settings.discard_confirm: There are unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?
dialog.prompt_settings.unsaved_changes: There are unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close?

template.extract_design_goals.desc: Extract structured design goals from user requirements
template.initial_design.desc: Generate initial SPICE circuit based on design goals
template.analyze_simulation_results.desc: Analyze simulation results and compare with design goals
